name.ja: <ruby>ＲＲ<rt>レイド・ラプターズ</rt></ruby>－グロリアス・ブライト

text.en: If you control a "Raidraptor" monster: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, or, if you control a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster, you can target 1 face-up card they control instead; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your "Raidraptor" monsters that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 "Raidraptor - Barrage" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
